data.name: DEEMO -Reborn- Prime Pack IV
data.detailed_description:
DEEMO -Reborn- Prime Pack IV

DEEMO -Reborn- Prime Pack IV, has a total of 10 songs and 50 charts

DEEMO -Reborn- Prime Pack IV contains the following:

1. Revival by TQ
・Difficulty
　PC: Easy 1 / Normal 6 / Hard 10
　VR: Easy 2 / Hard 10
2. Oceanus by cosMo@bousou-P
・Difficulty
　PC: Easy 6 / Normal 8 / Hard 10
　VR: Easy 6 / Hard 10
3. Lifill by Feryquitous feat. Sennzai
・Difficulty
　PC: Easy 4 / Normal 6 / Hard 8
　VR: Easy 4 / Hard 8
4. LILI by Rigel Theatre
・Difficulty
　PC: Easy 4 / Normal 8 / Hard 10
　VR: Easy 3 / Hard 10
5. Wish upon a shooting star by SUi
・Difficulty
　PC: Easy 3 / Normal 6 / Hard 8
　VR: Easy 4 / Hard 8
6. AngelFalse by Sakuzyo
・Difficulty
　PC: Easy 4 / Normal 8 / Hard 10
　VR: Easy 4 / Hard 10
7. Farewell Waltz by Stone
・Difficulty
　PC: Easy 2 / Normal 4 / Hard 7
　VR: Easy 1 / Hard 7
8. Toys Etude by soyomogi
・Difficulty
　PC: Easy 3 / Normal 7 / Hard 9
　VR: Easy 5 / Hard 9
9. Like Asian Spirit by Valunava
・Difficulty
　PC: Easy 4 / Normal 7 / Hard 9
　VR: Easy 3 / Hard 9
10. Infinite Puzzle by Y-SHIN
・Difficulty
　PC: Easy 5 / Normal 7 / Hard 9
　VR: Easy 5 / Hard 9

data.short_description: DEEMO -Reborn- Prime Pack IVDEEMO -Reborn- Prime Pack IV, has a total of 10 songs and 50 chartsContent includes outstanding works by creators such as TQ, cosMo@bousou-P, Feryquitous, Sennzai, Rigel Theatre, SUi, Sakuzyo, Stone, soyomogi, Valunava and Y-SHIN.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 64-bits, Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 3.1GHz / AMD Radeon FX-8120 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 64-bits, Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 3.1GHz / AMD Radeon FX-8120 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
